title: ETFs, Markets, And Broadcom (Podcast)
itunes:title: ETFs, Markets, And Broadcom (Podcast)
description:
Sylvia Jablonski, Chief Investment Officer, Co-Founder at Defiance ETFs, discusses ETFs, inflation, investment strategies, and outlook for a recession in the US. Randy Schwimmer, Co-head of Senior Lending at Churchill Asset Management, talks about markets, inflation, and the economy amid global uncertainty. Liz McCormick, Chief Correspondent: Global Macro Markets for Bloomberg News, discusses volatile markets and the S&P touching bear territory Friday. Woo Jin Ho, Senior Hardware Analyst with Bloomberg Intelligence, joins the show to discuss the Broadcom-VMware potential deal. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Kriti Gupta.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
